hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: When all else fails, use Fire.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Din's Fire# can be found at #Zora's River#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Mirror Shield# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Prelude of Light#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #the Fire Arrows#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that if you don't use your slingshot at all when you play the slingshot minigame, the owner gets upset with you.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #1# major item.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Heart Container#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #0# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of time.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Theater

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Invisible Enemies Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Blue Potion Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple GS Level Island Courtyard

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the path to #Morpha#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #the Market#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found #outside Ganon's Castle#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.
